content:
new blog post! https://bytecodealliance.org/articles/wasmtime-portability

This article details in-progress standards proposals to lift [Wasm's language-level portability limitations]; enumerates recent engineering efforts to greatly expand Wasmtime's platform support; and, finally, shares some ways that you can get involved and help us further improve Wasm's portability.

thanks for reading and sharing!

Making WebAssembly and Wasmtime More Portable
Portability is among the first properties promoted on WebAssemblyâ€™s officialhomepage:
